name: Brumley
text:
Brumley
Mr. Brumley was a janitor at the Germantown Friends School.
On April 2, 1968, Brumley caught Dale Cooper climbing out of an air vent in the janitor's closet. Suspicious of Cooper's purpose for being in the vent, Brumley followed a trail of dust he left to discover that he had been spying on a girls' sexual education class. Brumley, along with the school's headmaster and Mrs. Winslow, confronted Cooper the next day and confiscated the tape he had recorded of the class.
By 1988, Brumley had retired, after winning $50,000 gambling in Atlantic City.
